text: aur jab hum logo ko us amr ke badh ke un par koi musibath pad chuki ho,kisi nemath ka maza chaka dete hai tuh wo fauran hee hamari ayato ke bare mein chaale chalne lagte hai,aap keh dijiye ke Allah chaal chalne mein tum se zyada tez hai,bilyaqin hamare farishte tumhari sub chaalo ko likh rahe hai
